sentences.en: A new node architecture of OADM - The B & S OADM is Analyzed.
sentences.cn: 分析了一种新的 OADM 节点结构-广播与选择型光分插复用器.

sentences.en: A node that can send and receive packets, and route packets from one node to another.
sentences.cn: 能够收发信息包并能把信息包从一网点传向另一网点的一种网点.

sentences.en: An axis defines a node - set relative to the current node.
sentences.cn: 坐标轴是用于定义与当前节点相关的节点集.

sentences.en: Cut them off cleanly through the stem just below the node.
sentences.cn: 就从茎节下面，沿茎干把它们全砍掉。

sentences.en: For each child node the specification effort is calculated.
sentences.cn: 对于每个子节点规范努力计算.

sentences.en: From the SA node, electrical impulses spread through the heart muscle to trigger the heartbeat.
sentences.cn: 从窦房石结出来的电脉冲传播到心脏肌肉触发心脏跳动.

sentences.en: High component offer a reward [ about lymph node ] add cent!
sentences.cn: 高分悬赏 [ 关于淋巴结 ] 追加分!

sentences.en: If there a geavier srrangement white node, processing instruction with a scattered.
sentences.cn: 如果笔划接错处有不白色节不面时, 以打散的指令办理即可.

sentences.en: In Solution Explorer, right - click the solution node, then click Properties.
sentences.cn: 在“解决方案资源管理器”中, 右击解决方案节点, 再单击“属性”.

sentences.en: Lymph node enlargement occurs early in chronic lymphocytic leukemia.
sentences.cn: 慢性淋巴细胞性白血病,出现淋巴结肿大较早.

sentences.en: Node path length can be calculated in accordance with the shortest path!
sentences.cn: 可以根据节点路径长度计算最短路径! -Vc6.

sentences.en: Removes every node in the source collection from its parent node.
sentences.cn: 将源集合中的每个节点从其父节点中移除.

sentences.en: The unknowns in the equations are the values of the dependent variables at the node.
sentences.cn: 方程中的未知数是结点上因变量的值.

sentences.en: X - ray chest film or CT showed multi - node and patchy consolidation.
sentences.cn: 线胸片或ct显示双肺多发结节影和斑片状浸润影.

sentences.en: Zero velocities on the cylinder were satisfied at the node points.
sentences.cn: 圆柱上速度为零在节点上满足.

trans.tran_cn: 节点，（计算机网络的）节点，[医]结节，植物的节
trans.tran_en: the place on the stem of a plant from which a leaf or branch grows
